definitions.definition: Any plant of the genus Antirrhinum , with showy yellow , white or red flowers .
A game in which raisins are snatched from a vessel containing burning brandy , and eaten; the substance snatched and eaten during the playing of the game; the vessel used for the game.

main_definition: ( countable ) Any plant of the genus Antirrhinum , with showy yellow , white or red flowers .
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable ) A game in which raisins are snatched from a vessel containing burning brandy , and eaten; the substance snatched and eaten during the playing of the game; the vessel used for the game.
